sentences.sContent: Walter begged her pardon for all the pain he had caused her.
sentences.sCn: 沃尔特请求她原谅自己给她造成那么多痛苦。
“快点，乔纳森！”“你说什么啊？”“我说快点！”

sentences.sContent: The two spies were pardoned yesterday by the President.
sentences.sCn: 那两名间谍昨天得到了总统的赦免。

phrases.pCn: 原谅(或宽恕)某人(做)某事(如犯错误等) [亦作 pardon someone something]

trans.tranOther: (for sth) the action of forgiving sb for sth
used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it
to officially allow someone who has been found guilty of a crime to go free without being punished
